<js>

var info = doc.select("div.panel-body").select("div.col-xs-6");

result = all

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
JSON.parse(result).data.list.map(o=>{
    var bid = o.id;
    var option = JSON.stringify({'method':'POST','body':'_time=1568281576&_access_token=70c65dcbebf421dbab82e3af6521a051&bookId=' + bid});
    var J = JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://app.quyuedu.hzquyue.com/v2/book.html,'+ option)).data;
    return {
       name:  o.title,
       author:o.nickname,
       tags:  J.category,
       num: J.char_num+'字',
       latest: '第' + J.last_chapter.chapter_num + '章 ' + J.last_chapter.title+String(java.timeFormat(Number(J.last_update_time)*1000)).replace(/(\d+\/\d+\/\d+).*/,'（$1）'),
       intro: o.introduction,
       cover: o.front_cover.replace(/_.*/,'_96x137'),
       catalogUrl: '/book/chapterList.html,'+ option
    }
});
</js>

JSON.parse(result).data.slice(0,3).map(o=>{
    var option = JSON.stringify({"method": "POST","body": "action=book&id="+o.articleid});
    var detail = baseUrl+','+option;
    var J = JSON.parse(java.ajax(detail)).data.info;
    return {
      name:o.articlename,
      author:o.author,
      tags:o.catename,
      num:o.size+'字',
      latest:String(J.lastchapter).replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*[】）\)]/,'')+String(o.update_time).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/,'（$1）'),
      intro:o.intro,
      cover:o.images,
      name:o.articlename,
      catalogUrl: 'https://m.wanbentxt.com/'+o.articleid+'/all.html'
   }
});
</js>

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));

	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),

	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var toc = J.select('#chapterList a')
  .toArray()
  .map(function (el) {
    return {
      text: el.text(),
      href: el.attr('href'),
    };
  });

var latestChapterUrl = J.select('[og:novel:latest_chapter_url]').attr(
  'content'
);

if (!String(latestChapterUrl).includes(toc[toc.length - 1].url)) {
  toc.push({
    text: J.select('[og:novel:latest_chapter_name]').attr('content'),
    href: latestChapterUrl,
  });
}

toc;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: J.select('.detail i').eq(1).text() + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: String(J.select('.desc').html()).replace(/.*内容简介：/, ''),
  url: og('novel:read_url'),
};

book;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
发现：全网排行
搜索：全网搜书
原网：直达原网

搜索关键字
──────
完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名
简化格式4(夸克官方数据)：#作者
──────
目录排序：网站章节目录错乱的小说网站质量很差，对这种网站的小说目录重新排序浪费时间不值得，故夸克原网不对目录进行排序，如果想对目录排序请使用“夸克电脑”，夸克电脑对章节进行了重新排序
